general

Class EndScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • general.EndScreen

  • public class EndScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the end screen when Sonic reaches the end of a level

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BUTTON_H
